summary: Look at the title. You want me to say anything else?
descriptionHtml:
Simply make your hands 2.3x faster when using crossbows. (those added by mods won't be affected!)
Will make a video soon.
I know there's another fast crossbow mod on Steam Workshop, but it's just weird to me, so I decided to make my own one.

* I'm gathering talents to make the massive unofficial DLC Dominion, urgently need CK workers, voice actors/actresses/editors, papyrus scripters, and possibly concept artists!
Visit this page to know more: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1279053-the-elder-scrolls-v-dominion-recruiting-talents/
note that the page hasn't been updated for quite a time. gonna work on it tmr*
